attributes.action: closely monitor the development of technology that is intelligent enough to question its purpose
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Technology is advancing at a rapid rate and this is a good thing, but scientists will strive to create more intelligent technology, I simply think the government should keep an eye on how developed this artificial intelligence is to prevent it questioning its purpose

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
